title: Sarita Mohanty: Investing in Compassion
itunes:title: Sarita Mohanty: Investing in Compassion
description: The tradition of abandoning our elderly populations needs to end. Sarita Mohanty talks with Rob Johnson about her work at the SCAN Foundation, and the critical importance of combating "ageism" to strengthening our society. Learn more: https://www.thescanfoundation.org/
